MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G78 postcode area of Barrhead, affecting properties in Springhill Road and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00AM due to repairs required to a faulty piece of equipment at Springhill substation. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on this and it may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.22AM on 23 January 2021.
